summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Video Generation Web App with focus on Scene Manager approval workflow. Tested 7-step progress indicator, image/video approval workflow, bulk selection controls, and proper routing. Core video generation workflow implemented correctly with proper approval gates.

minor_issues.issue: Missing CORS headers on OPTIONS requests
minor_issues.impact: May cause issues with browser preflight requests

expected_failures.issue: Script decomposition fails with test API key
expected_failures.impact: Expected behavior - requires valid Gemini API key

expected_failures.issue: Video generation fails without approved images
expected_failures.impact: Expected workflow behavior - videos only generate from approved images

expected_failures.issue: Final assembly fails without approved videos
expected_failures.impact: Expected workflow behavior - final video only from approved clips

passed_tests: Landing page loads with proper design and hero section
Google OAuth authentication redirects to auth.emergentagent.com correctly
Scene Manager loads with correct route (/project/{id}/scenes)
7-step progress indicator displays correctly (Script, Scenes, Images, Approve Images, Videos, Approve Videos, Final)
Tabs for Images and Videos working with proper counts
Bulk approval controls present (Select All Pending, Approve Selected, Reject Selected)
Scene cards display with checkboxes for individual selection
Progress Summary sidebar shows detailed statistics
Image approval workflow UI implemented correctly
Video approval workflow UI implemented correctly
Videos only generate from approved images (workflow enforced)
Final video only assembles from approved clips (workflow enforced)
API key management and validation working
Proper error handling for unauthorized access
Responsive design and proper UI layout
